content: सकाम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Full of love, impassioned, loving. {@--2@} Lustful, amorous. {@--3@} One who has got his desired object, satisfied, contented; काम इदानीं सकामो भवत् <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; किमन्यत् सकामा कपालकुंडला <ls>Māl. 9.</ls> --मं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} With pleasure. {@--2@} Contentedly. {@--3@} Assuredly, indeed.
